## A Little LaTeX

$$
x = \mu 
$$

One dollar sign creates an inline equation, like $Y_i = 3X_i$

Two dollar signs creates a display equation, like this:

$$
Y_i = 3X_i 
$$

### Superscripts

$$
a^2 + b^2 = c^2 
$$

$$
